name: Dialog Solutions
overview:
Dialog Solutions is the specialist of next-generation online dialogue software & services.

Dialog Solutions is the specialist of next-generation online dialogue solutions to create business value through research communities & social media/social CRM. The company was founded by Patrick Willemarck & Alexandre Vandermeersch, two senior business executives who combine years of expertise at McKinsey&Company, P&G, Grey, Young&Rubicam.

Its key products are:

  • Brandialog - an online research community & platform to drive insights through private brand communities: co-creation, product feedback, & other research mixing both quantitative & qualitative techniques in an innovative way
  • DialogCube - itâ€™s community software reinvented in 2011, with a focus on conversations, & full integration of social media conversations. Questions & answers, voting, following of topics, sharing of conversations, highlights,… Animate the space through simple Retweets, start a conversation on Twitter, continue it on your site (in which the cube is integrated), and finish it on Facebook - bringing more viral loops to your site, where you have control. DialogCube is perfect for marketing dialogue, customer service, open innovation, & other use cases
  • Dialogfeed - Dialogfeed is the first & only â€˜Social Media Amplificationâ€™ Software as a Service tool to drive back great conversations into your web site, including â€˜highlight/hideâ€™ of conversations, and full widget customization

Among its key clients are Deutsche Bank, Touring, Lâ€™OrÃ©al, Danone, Delta Lloyd, and many others in all sectors.
